plot: Donald has a date with Daisy, but no money. He raids his nephews' piggy bank, but his guilty conscience catches up with him.
title: Donald's Crime
plot_es: Donald has a date with Daisy, but no money. He raids his nephews' piggy bank, but his guilty conscience catches up with him.
plot_en: Donald has a date with Daisy, but no money. He raids his nephews' piggy bank, but his guilty conscience catches up with him.
